short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome extension that allows users to quickly build their vocabulary on the Fluentez website by selecting text anywhere

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This Chrome extension allows users to quickly build their vocabulary on the Fluentez website by selecting text anywhere on the web. When a user highlights a word or phrase, the extension automatically saves it to their personal vocabulary list on Fluentez, making the process of learning new words both convenient and efficient. There's no need to switch between tabs or apps everything is recorded and synced instantly while browsing the web.
